forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High around 55F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 43F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.
